document.full_text: detroit's kris draper, darren helm and patrick eaves drew praise for their play in a first-round sweep of phoenix in the n.h.l. playoffs.
document.title: a delight for detroit: the return of the grind line
lines_and_colors: detroit's kris draper, darren helm and patrick eaves drew praise for their play in a first-round sweep of phoenix in the n.h.l. playoffs.
